name: Repeat after Me (FasePlay)
description:
A small top-down turn-based puzzle game, created for Wowie-4 Game Jam.

Theme: Collaborate with AI

Help your Robot friend to stay alive, so he could help you pass through the rooms in the game "Repeat after Me"!

Controls:

WASD - move,

E - continue dialogue,

SPACE - skip turn,

R - restart level.

Avaliable WebGL version to play in browser!

Windows version coming after jam!
